Package search_engine.indexer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dictionary
    Singleton class

    The dictionary store all the known Vocabulary as a tuple <vocabulary,df> where df is document frequency: number of documents this word has appeared.
    DocumentList
    Singleton class

    * This class provides the implementation of DocumentList
    A DocumentList is a list of documentName, each is then assigned a docId upon adding
    The docId is simply the index of the documentName in the list

    Note: The DocumentList needs to be close () when done to save all the changes into files
    Indexer
    This class provide index service to index a single document to the database of the search engine.
    Posting
    Posting provides a local posting, which will contains a list of document ID in which a word appear
    This class supports Comparable, which used to sort Posting based on the vocabularyId the Posting has
    PostingList
    This class provides implementation of a PostingList and services related to PostingList
    The core data structure is a List of Posting
    PostTuple
    This class provides an implementation of a tuple in which tf is term frequency: number of appearance of a particular vocabulary in the document with stored docId
    Vocabulary
    The private implementation of Vocabulary in Dictionary which basically a implementation of <word, df> where word is the stemmed token and df is the number of documents the word appeared in
    The class supports Comparable, which basically compare the word of the Vocabulary
